## Key Development Guidelines

For detailed development implementation guidelines, see [docs/design_guidelines.md](../docs/design_guidelines.md#development-implementation-guidelines).

This includes:

- Code style priorities and development philosophy
- Component implementation patterns
- Animation timing and interaction specifications
- Accessibility and performance requirements
- Critical design requirements (colors, typography, layout)

**Important**: When suggesting code, always prioritize the terminal aesthetic specifications over generic solutions.
